net.proteusframework.ui.miwt

Class MIWTException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.MIWTException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CannotCloseMIWTException

    public class MIWTException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Base exception for MIWT exceptions.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected long _componentId
      The component ID or -1 if none.
      protected long _eventId
      The event ID that was being processed or -1 if none.
      protected @Nullable WindowManager _windowManager
      The window manager for the component or null.
